items.title: A Long Overdue Victory on Public Broadcasting
items.description: President Trump and Republicans have finally followed through on something conservatives have dreamed about for decades.

items.title: California’s High-Speed Rail to Nowhere
items.description: There was no reason for the feds to pour good money after bad supporting a preposterous project that doesn’t have any national significance.

items.title: Throwing Conservatives a Bone Won’t Fix What’s Wrong with Harvard
items.description: Until the university decides to take on viewpoint diversity seriously, the faculty’s concerns about external pressure will continue to ring hollow.

items.title: President Trump’s Lawfare Against Senator Schiff
items.description: There’s probably no prosecutable federal case, since the statute of limitations has expired.

items.title: Boston’s Freedom Trail, Even in Sauna Weather, Rouses Heart and Soul
items.description: Bunker Hill, a sundered church, and Patriot graves convey the Revolution’s tumult, plus lessons in Puritan design.
